about_the_game:
Math Match.

A puzzle game will help develop the ability to instantly analyze information, improve the speed of decision making and quick counting skills. During the game you will be offered two arithmetic expressions and you will need to determine which of them is larger or whether they are equal to each other. The faster you make the calculations, the more points you will earn.
detailed_description:
Math Match.

A puzzle game will help develop the ability to instantly analyze information, improve the speed of decision making and quick counting skills. During the game you will be offered two arithmetic expressions and you will need to determine which of them is larger or whether they are equal to each other. The faster you make the calculations, the more points you will earn.

  • Processor: intel Core 2 Dual
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Sound Card: Any
